class_notes: This course is part of the Voluntary Core Curriculum, Emory College's Great Books program.
course_description: This course will focus on the original key writings and research articles in the history of Western psychology Readings will be discussed from scientific, historical, cultural and philosophical perspectives and placed within the larger context of Western Thought.
